name: Defenchick TD - Chicken Tower Defense
description:
Tower Defense: Defenchick TD — a fun offline strategy arcade game in the genre of Tower Defense, which will please gamers with its stylish, modern, and high-quality graphics, a large number of levels with increasing complexity, simple controls, and funny characters.

In the story of the game, angry alien slugs are trying to get into your farm with one very important mission, they want to steal your chickens and probably eat them. You play as a brave farmer who for some unknown reason was ready for the invasion. What are you waiting for? Get turrets from the barn. Don’t let the alien slugs realize their insidious plans and stand up for the defense of your territories. Hordes of alien slugs dream of getting your chickens at any cost, and it is important for you to build a line of defense and adapt to changes in enemy attack tactics in time. 

The game is imbued with humor, colorful locations, and automatic towers to protect territories. Develop victorious tactics, defense strategy, and don’t let insidious enemies steal your chickens.
